EmailTemplate.description: This is sent to APMs when deadline for all expenses has passed
EmailTemplate.name: SF to APM/PM: Deadline for expenses has passed
EmailTemplate.subject: Please check any remaining expenses
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Wave__c.APM_first_name_del__c},
The deadline for all summer staff expenses from the programme was the 31st Oct.
Please could you check your reports for the final time and approve any remaining expenses claims.
To review your expenses, please go to your views on Expenses: https://na8.salesforce.com/a1P/o
This is a standard email, sent automatically on 1st November
